Text: Into Cinergy IndexPST Don We are starting to receive hourly trades for our into Cinergy hourly index Is there anything that I can do for you to assist you in sending your trades If so please dont hesitate to call me I am looking forward to receiving you hourly data for our index soon Thank you Lisa Lawson Markets Editor Megawatt Daily
